items.sentence: What would you do if you could live forever?
You can use my dictionary whenever you like.
Tatoeba: We've got sentences older than you.

We were shocked to hear Tom had been killed.
Everyone deserves good things, including me.
I don't often go to Australia in the winter.
Tom understands French but doesn't speak it.
I'm not suggesting any of us should do that.
A huge tanker just pulled out from the dock.
Our request for a pay raise was turned down.
The hotel charged me 8,000 yen for the room.
I finally graduated from junior high school.
No one can live to be two hundred years old.
There is nothing as important as friendship.
Tom didn't want Mary to know what he'd done.
